name: Joyride! (Lazy Dev Games)
description:
JOYRIDE!
How long can you outrun the cops? Dodge oncoming traffic and try to get the cops of your tail. Collect power-ups to extend your time and chances of success.

If you get knocked back to the left side of the screen, it's game over! Reach the right side of the screen to end your run, but will you still beat your record if you get away too quickly?

Joyride Features

  • Push your luck gameplay: See how you long you can last!
  • Old-school "Arcade" style objectives: A simple hi-score chase, but you'll want to keep replaying!
  • Multiple save slots: It's not every day you see a GB Studio game track multiple profiles. Try it out with your friends and compete for a hi-score!
  • Play on real hardware: Compatible with classic Gameboy, Pocket, and Gameboy Color (full color mode tbd)!

Special Thanks:

  • Music by Krumel, from the GB Studio Community Assets
  • Playtesting and Feedback from SkRap Klan and Max Oakland

Dev Comments:
Joyride is being released for free, as I've started to have less free time to work on Gameboy projects. Donations are not required, but are definitely appreciated to continue funding development of my games! There's so much more I'd like to do for this game!

Please leave a review/rating :)
